dict.acceptation: Common Agricultural Policy （欧共体）共同农业政策；

sent.orig: That is Mr Obama's stated aim, but the prospects for a comprehensive cap-and-trade bill look poor.
sent.trans: 这也是奥巴马申明的目标，但是碳总量管制及交易(cap-and-trade)法案的前景并不看好。

sent.orig: OBJECTIVE: To evaluate the effect of macrolide antibiotics on community-acquired pneumonia (CAP) .
sent.trans: 目的：评价大环内酯类抗生素在社区获得性肺炎(CAP)治疗中的作用。

sent.orig: Macrolides and penicillins are currently the first-line treatments for respiratory tract infections such as CAP.
sent.trans: 大环内酯类和青霉素类是目前临床上治疗诸如CAP此类呼吸道感染的一线药物。

sent.orig: Objective To compare the efficacy and toxicity of regimen CAF with regimen CAP.
sent.trans: 目的 比较CAF方案和CAP方案治疗晚期乳腺癌的疗效以及毒性反应。

sent.orig: To determine the content of Chloramphenicol (CAP) in honey using stable isotope dilution technique.
sent.trans: 建立稳定同位素稀释技术测定蜂蜜中氯霉素(CAP)分析方法。
